description: Trevor Long receives an unexpected visitor in Los Angeles—a fellow ranch hand from back home: Tom Faulk. It turns out Tom is looking for the freedom that Trevor gained in LA—he can’t be himself at the ranch back in the country, so he made his way to the city to woo Trevor off his feet and to get some dick. Trevor welcomes Tom’s ass and fucks his tight hole full of that model-grade cock.
title: American Sex Story Part 3
